mapper.select: select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store from goods where id = #{id}
select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store from goods where good_name = #{goodName}
select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store from goods where good_category = #{goodCategory}
select id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store from goods order by good_sales
mapper.insert: insert into goods (id, good_name, good_price, good_category, good_introduction, good_sales, good_options, good_picture, good_store) values (#{id},#{goodName},#{goodPrice},#{goodCategory},#{goodIntroduction},#{goodSales},#{goodOptions},#{goodPicture},#{goodStore})
mapper.update: update goods set good_name = #{goodName} where id = #{id}
